name: lanky
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
tall and thin and often moving awkwardly as a result: I was your typical lanky teenager.

Add to word list
tall and thin and often tending to move awkwardly as a result: He shifted his lanky body uncomfortably in the cramped airplane seat.
